meta_description_site: Bruna Nunes portfolio. Frontend Web Developer.
hero_description: Frontend Developer, passionate about transforming codes into engaging, creative, scalable and accessible visual experiences :)
about_description:
Frontend Web Developer.
Graduated in Systems Analysis and Development and with experience in building and maintaining the frontend of different digital products, websites, landing pages, platforms and web systems.
Focused on modern and consistent technologies and construction of relevant and interactive experiences.
Professional in search of constant improvement, day by day.
project_blush_description: A Design System made in VueJS, created to facilitate, accelerate and standardize the development of interfaces.
project_dashboard_description: Social Media Dashboard Interface created to solve a challenge from Frontendmentor
project_lp_description: Landing page with dark theme created to solve a challenge from Frontendmentor
alt_photo_header: Photo of Bruna Nunes. Red hair, with round glasses
alt_logo_header: Logo with the name Bruna Nunes
alt_photo_hero: Illustration of Bruna Nunes. Red hair and a brown background
alt_project_blush: Demonstrative image of the System Blush Design Project. Two prints of the project, one showing the figma with components and the other showing the documentation home page.
alt_project_dashboard: Demonstrative image of the Dashboard Project. Two prints of the project, one representing the dark mode and the other light mode. Dashboard with colorful cards.
alt_project_lp: Demonstrative image of the Landing Page Project. Two prints of the project, one showing the beginning of the landing page with the hero, features section and a section with image and description. The second showing the page's contact form and footer
